price: 3. Ye nde akeli mapata sambo ya komatelama, boye okomona eloko ya mabe na kati ya bokeli ya Ar-Rahmân(1) te. Zongisa miso тропа kotala lisusu, okomona sé kitoko.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗاۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِي خَلۡقِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِن تَفَٰوُتٖۖ فَٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ هَلۡ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alladhī khalaqa sabʿa samāwātin ṭibāqan mā tarā fī khalqi al-raḥmāni min tafāwutin fa-ir'jiʿi al-baṣara hal tarā min fuṭūrin
